page.title: 11FARMING PROJECTS
page.content:
Farming projects in area are:-
CALF REARING. Calves bought young and bucket reared till weaned. Sold to beef farmers at 6 to 7 cwt. for finishing to slaughter weight. DAIRY. Larger units have dairy herds, all are Friesian. BEEF. Hereford and Charolais crosses raised on most units. SHEEP. Lambing flocks kept. Dominant breed is the Suffolk. POULTRY. No commercial poultry. Domestic only. CEREALS. Wheat and barley produced. No oats grown. HAY/SILAGE. Hay and silage made. Silage takes precedence over hay. OTHER CROPS. Fodder crops grown to supplement animal dietary requirements.
